com.decoded.stereohttp

Class StereoHttpRequestHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.decoded.stereohttp.StereoHttpRequestHandler

  • public class StereoHttpRequestHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    The internal class used by Stereo to make http requests on its non-blocking Http Client.

    • Constructor Summary
